title: Can anyone tell me how long the "Guaranteed your role because you we're autofilled recently" lasts?
body:
I just got stuck in a support role, where top and mid failed miserably 
and feeling somewhat tilted, and wouldnt mind a break but I'd rather 
queue up immediately if it means I'm not getting autofilled again.

Does this last till I logout, or a hour, or a day?

Anyone?

replies.body: I think it is 3 games. I might be wrong but I'm fairly certain that it's on a per game basis rather than time
although it resets once the season ends, so it lasts around a year.
